betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oFound on top of the large fortress on top of the ice wall.

§fThe architecture built by the people of the Twilight Forest is truly amazing, even when in ruin, and taken over by monsters. Their fate is truly sad. They were powerful, knowledgeable, and most importantly, curious. 
The line between genuine inquisitiveness and greed is a fine one, and who knows wether or not the interests of the scholars of this land belonged to the former or the latter.
With regards to wanting to manipulate organic matter, there likely must have been a higher goal, a concrete objective, a mission.
I wanted to be famous, to receive the Nobel prize. I know I was greedy with my pursuits, but the beauty of the unknown was still there to guide me, and what a beauty!
